summary: This is an internal FBI email from August 9, 2019, providing an update on the status of a search warrant (SW) related to Jeffrey Epstein. The email indicates the warrant is under judicial review in St. Thomas, with plans for agents to meet the judge the following day. It discusses potential travel plans contingent on the warrant's approval.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the search warrant being discussed in the email, indicating an active investigation into him.

events.title: Search Warrant Review Update
events.description: An FBI email provides an update that a search warrant related to Jeffrey Epstein is being reviewed by a judge in St. Thomas. The judge is in San Juan for training but will return to St. Thomas the next day to potentially sign the warrant.

events.title: Planned Meeting to Sign Warrant
events.description: Case agents are scheduled to meet the judge at chambers to sign the Epstein-related search warrant.

keyFacts: An active FBI investigation involving Jeffrey Epstein was ongoing as of August 9, 2019, requiring a search warrant.
The search warrant was under judicial review in St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands.
The reviewing judge was temporarily in San Juan, Puerto Rico, for training.
FBI case agents from the Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking squad were involved in the operation.
Travel plans for the investigation team were contingent on the warrant being signed by Sunday morning (August 11, 2019).
